resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103271</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103271</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973915</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Harpooned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Harpuniert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Harponné</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Harpooned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Harpooned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Harpooned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arponeado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Harpooned is a free game for Windows. It is a Cetacean Research Simulator, where you play the role of a Japanese scientist performing research on whales around Antarctica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Harpuniert ein freies Spiel für Windows. Es
ist ein Cetacean Forschung Simulator, in dem Sie die Rolle eines 
japanischen Wissenschaftlers spielen, der Forschung auf Walen um 
Antarktik durchführt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Harponné est un jeu libre pour Windows. 
C'est un simulateur cétacé de recherches, où vous jouez le 
rôle d'un scientifique japonais exécutant la recherche sur des 
baleines autour de l'Antarctique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Harpooned um jogo livre para Windows. É um 
simulador cetacean da pesquisa, onde você jogue o papel de um 
cientista japonês que executa a pesquisa sobre baleias em torno do 
antarctica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Harpooned un gioco libero per Windows. È un
simulatore cetacean di ricerca, in cui svolgete il ruolo di uno 
scienziato giapponese che realizza la ricerca sulle balene intorno 
all'Antartide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Harpooned είναι ένα ελεύθερο παιχνίδι για τα 
Windows. Είναι ένας κητώδης ερευνητικός προσομοιωτής, 
όπου διαδραματίζετε το ρόλο ενός ιαπωνικού επιστήμονα που 
εκτελεί την έρευνα για τις φάλαινες γύρω από την Ανταρκτική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se arponea un juego libre para Windows. Es 
un simulador cetáceo de la investigación, donde usted desempeña el 
papel de un científico japonés que realiza la investigación sobre 
ballenas alrededor del antártida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973915</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103271</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/harpooned</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
